audio.speaker: dancer
audio.text: I see you're at the buffet table straight away.

audio.speaker: hungry
audio.text: Yeah, I'm starving. I had a 12-hour shift, haven't eaten since breakfast.

audio.speaker: dancer
audio.text: Damn! Get some food in you!

audio.speaker: drinker
audio.text: So, are we partying hard, or hardly partying? Am I right?

audio.speaker: hungry
audio.text: You know that joke gets funnier every time you tell it.

audio.speaker: hungry
audio.text: I know you think it's irony. But after enough times, it just becomes genuine.

audio.speaker: allaround
audio.text: Did you see that ludicrous display last night?

audio.speaker: drinker
audio.text: What was Wenger thinking sending Walcott on that early?

audio.speaker: allaround
audio.text: Thing about arsenal is they always try and walk it in!
